channel.title: The Server Status Page
channel.description: Yes the staff is currently aware that it is messed up right now. Moparisthebest is going to work on it some time tonight and it will hopefully be fixed soon. Please do not post any topics about it as that will not help the staff at all. Please be patient until it is fixed, which hopefully wont be long.

item.title: The Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I am currently in the process completely re-writing the server status page from scratch and integrating it with the forum, so your server and online status will be advertised in your profile as well. This new page will also support multiple other versions instead of just 317 like the current page.

edit:
For input on the new page, go here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

edit2:
The current page is now fixed, but the new page is still on the way.

Read full topic
